name: 无法传达的话语（Words cannot convey）
name_original: 无法传达的话语（Words cannot convey）
description:
game introduction

When will this love be conveyed to you?

In the last year of high school, I want to convey this feeling to you.


-- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

game features

This game uses two ways of seeing men and women to talk about two pairs of Ming and Ming, but they do not know each other.
Finally, through the player's option branch, get out of the different ending of the text plot AVG game.

1. double play of men and women. There are 2 branches and 4 perspectives.
The 2. text is about 20 thousand words.
3. full voice performance.
